author: Reuters Editorial
title: Aveo Group Posts ‍HY Profit After Tax Attributable Of $149.3 Mln
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Aveo Group:
* ‍HY PROFIT AFTER TAX ATTRIBUTABLE TO STAPLED SECURITY HOLDERS $149.3 MILLION, UP 23.2%​
* ‍HY REVENUE $208 MILLION, DOWN 10.5 PERCENT​ * ‍REAFFIRMS EPS GUIDANCE FOR FY18​ * ‍TARGETS FY DISTRIBUTION AMOUNT BASED ON A PAYOUT RANGE OF 40% TO 60% OF UNDERLYING PROFIT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
